QuestData.Title: City of Gold
QuestData.Description: Rezan and Rastakhan did not wait for us. Dey are marching up de mountain to Atal'Dazar, de City of Gold.$b$bYou, Loti, and I need to catch up quick and give dem some air support. Hop aboard.
QuestData.LogDescription: Break Zul's forces on the road to Atal'Dazar.
